revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Digletts Cave |image = [[File:Digletts Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Digletts Cave. |tokens = 95 |location = Entrance 1: North of Viridian Forest, on Route 2.
Entrance 2: East of Vermilion City, on Route 11. }} '''Digletts Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,962 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Diglett.png|40px]] Diglett || colspan=2|
N/A |- |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- |[[File:Dugtrio.png|40px]] Dugtrio ||
16,040 || colspan=3|
N/A |} ==Items== ===No Debuff=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 39.46% || 38.62% || 34.88% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 39.46% || 38.62% || 34.88% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.26% || 14.50% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.26% || 14.50% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Wiki}} || 2 || 0.01% || 0.16% || 0.82% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.08% || 0.41% |} ===Debuff Drop Table=== After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic). {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.88% || 37.88% || 37.88% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.88% || 37.88% || 37.88% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.12% || 12.12% || 12.12% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.12% || 12.12% || 12.12% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Wiki}} || 2 || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} {{Kanto Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #1 - Kanto^c]]
